name: KiCad AI Assistant with Nexar API
description: ðŸš€ AI assistant with real-time component pricing from Nexar API! Multi-distributor pricing (Digi-Key, Mouser, Farnell, etc.) in one call. FREE tier: 1K calls/month. Multilingual support (EN, NL, DE, ES, FR, PT).
description_full: Advanced AI assistant for KiCad with Nexar API integration for real-time component pricing from multiple distributors. Features: multi-distributor pricing comparison, stock availability, smart alternatives, BOM cost analysis, and PCB/schematic design assistance. Free tier available with 1000 API calls per month. Three interaction modes with multilingual support.
